website_summaries.verdict: It's a reasonable choice if you are new to working out or prefer an intermediate gym. Otherwise, its limitations may leave you wanting more.
pros: Mid-range price is attractive to budget-conscious consumers

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded to 410 lbs.... how to.
customer_reviews.text: well made, and with a little warranty voiding custom work, can be made to work with the 310lb and 410 lb upgrade kits. See my pictures in the customer uploaded pictures section for my instructions on how i did it. i dont know how safe this is, so do this at your own risk. it works fine on my bowflex though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry Machine - Don’t Pass It Up
customer_reviews.text: Great home gym! Really enjoy working out on this system. I’ve had it since April 2017 (its now Sept 2017) and still functions like new. All rods seem well made and (as far as I can tell) haven’t lost resistance. Took around two hours to setup by myself. The shipping box it came in was VERY rough and damaged. Was afraid the equipment inside would have been hurt, but thankfully everything was intact. Definitely have lost weight and gained muscle with this gym.
customer_reviews.author: Sammo123321

customer_reviews.title: Well made and yields good results.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a little less than 2 years with excellent results. Dramatic improvement in strength and stamina, also combined with cardio for weight loss. Well made, easy to use, and durable. I really don't have any complaints, but I am planning to add a 100 LB power rod upgrade next year so I can keep advancing my workouts. I prefer this above going to the gym and waiting on equipment, plus I don't need a spotter. I mostly use a cross fit routine because overall fitness is most important to me.
customer_reviews.author: M. McKnight

customer_reviews.title: ... decently made but I just cant get over how bad the bench is
customer_reviews.text: It's decently made but I just cant get over how bad the bench is. The base of the seat is held onto the rail but the back (larger part of the bench) just sits on top. It frequently falls/slides out from under me. As a whole the bench does not snap into any position. So its really just a balancing act; using your body weight to hold it in place. If I had known this I wouldnt have made the purchase but now that I have it, I'm going to make some warranty voiding modifications to make it a little more stable.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 56 year old woman who wasted $35 per month on a gym membership. Bought this bad boy for a great price, plus a tech to assemble it, and am happy as a clam. Am totally motivated to use it as it is easy to figure out, provides a great workout for every part of my body. It arrived in 3 days, assembly dude was here by the weekend and did a great job. Would highly recommend this product for those gals looking to get into better shape as they move into their later years....or for anybody really, except for perhaps those scary dudes at the men's gym. My 20 year old son loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hertel

customer_reviews.title: It's a little tedious to change the cables between exercises
customer_reviews.text: It's a little tedious to change the cables between exercises, especially if you're doing a total body workout. However, the changeover is quick, taking less than a minute to switch. The machine is sturdy and easy to use. Assembly was hassle free and the instructions were easy to follow. Also, this is the only Bowflex machine, to my knowledge, that offers cardio rowing. Overall, you can't beat the value of this machine.
customer_reviews.author: IronGargoyle

customer_reviews.title: it's ok for what it is i don't like the way it works i like free weights better ...
customer_reviews.text: it's ok for what it is i don't like the way it works i like free weights better but i thought this would be cool because it is supposed to work your muscles better because the resistance is the same through the whole range of motion and maybe it is better but i don't like the constant pressure
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Would have been great if part were labeled
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Took me about 2 hours to put together. The instructions stink! Parts are not labeled, but easy to get through it if you pay attention to the schematics. The bolts are the worst part because they are of similar sizes and several times I had to undo something I just did. Have a tape measure handy and measure the bolts (without the heads) to be sure which one you need for that step.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bowflex review
customer_reviews.text: This bowflex is still working for me. i use it everyday and then some. it can shift and do all sorts of different exercises. its a well built machine that will last years if you take care of it and handle it well. i have lost fat and gained muscle mass by using this machine over the last 4 years. it was a great investment. it also folds up for storage to decrease space in you house hold. will definitely recommend this product as it will last, and is something that will benefit your health.
customer_reviews.author: FitnessLife

customer_reviews.title: Home gym...
customer_reviews.text: I just finished putting it together ! I had an older model- when they came out in the early '80s-& I gave it to a brother- who's still using it ! (I didn't need it - as my former community had a large & nice gym. But I moved to another community-they don't have a "gym"-so...) Though this is the "classic/basic" model-it has more functions than the former moder & should work out great !
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ward

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly.  Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this very much. It's a quality product and very easy to assemble. When I opened the box, I was slightly overwhelmed with the amount of parts, but the directions were easy to follow. I think my total assembly time was less than two hours with breaks. Since I assembled it, I have used it very much and it's been working great!
customer_reviews.author: AJ430

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to build. Instructions are very clear.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for me and my wife's New Year's goal (we'll see how that goes, haha) As of now I'm giving this product a 5 star because of the clarity of the assembly instructions. Rarely have I put together something so easily. I had hip replacement surgery less than 3 weeks ago, so it takes me a bit of careful manuevering at the moment but even with that physical disadvantage, I was able to construct this in under two hours by myself. I did try a few reps afterwards and it does seem like it'll be a great 'get in shape for under $500' machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Highly Effective and a Great Price Taboot!
customer_reviews.text: The Bowflex PR1000 Home Gym has so many exercises that you can do to build a stronger, healthier body. It doesn't take up much space, and it's easy to switch from one exercise to the next or to switch the amount of weight you want to lift. You can get a whole body workout with this machine!
customer_reviews.author: countrygirl624

customer_reviews.title: ... you want to tone up or just get in better shape this is a great machine
customer_reviews.text: If you want to tone up or just get in better shape this is a great machine. Very smooth system. If you are an advanced body builder you already know that this is not enough resistance. I am an average size guy and have had this machine for a while, it gives me plenty of resistance to keep me in good shape. For most this is a great way to get a quick work out at home.
customer_reviews.author: road biker

customer_reviews.title: Great for the in-home workout!
customer_reviews.text: For a 1-stop home gym without the danger of using free weights without a spotter, you really can't go wrong with this piece of equipment. You do need to focus on technique in order to get the most out of your workout, but the safety factor is definitely there. Very sturdy and well made, I can see this lasting for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: D. Guindon

customer_reviews.title: Pros - easy to assembly
customer_reviews.text: Pros - easy to assembly, does not take up too much space, instructions include pictures that outline different excercises (sets) one can use to work out. These include exercises to work your chest, back, forearms, shoulders, legs, etc. Cons - Exercise instructions are too vague & it is difficult to distinguish what to do. Some pictures look similar and so more precise instructions would be helpful. Leg exercises aren't very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it. curls are 1 exercise you have to ...
customer_reviews.text: love it. curls are 1 exercise you have to figure out how to do if your shorter than 5'9. I do them laying on the bench. check out utubes. I don't use the leg attachments as I do spin and ride mtn bike 6 times a week, I get my leg exercises that way. should've ordered the bowflex without the leg attachments but this was worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Siffer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the home gym person
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my hubby and he works out almost every day! It has helped him to get the feeling of going to a gym, without the membership or driving into the city to get there. The strengths come from 5 lbs. up to 95 lbs. (I think...) so it is versatile for the home gym person. If you want weight training, go for something bigger and better. For average people, this is a perfect fit! I would recommend this to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Angie White

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly — just gotta do it methodically
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly — just gotta do it methodically. I’ve been using this at least 5 days per week. Well worth the price I paid. The 210 pounds (105 each side) is easy to use up, but enough to stay toned. This machine works well with my intermittent fasting program.
customer_reviews.author: JoPob

customer_reviews.title: Good deal but has its flaws
customer_reviews.text: Good deal however this machine does get boring. Main problem with this is that the bench part you lay on is not study. It falls down while sitting back on it. Another thing is that the weight amounts are not that heavy to progress as you get stronger. Good machine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Needs better organized nuts and bolts.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. No complaints about the equipment. Assembly is a little annoying. Most new items nowadays come with the nuts, bolts, washers and so forth pre-sorted attached to a hardboard for ease of assembly. No such luck with this. You get a bag of assorted nuts and bolts. So be prepared to spend some time organizing and labeling them before attempting assembly.
customer_reviews.author: inkdnnerdy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I just wish it was a little more portable. but other than that has been a great home gym that has held up last 2 years just fine. totally recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Live up to the hype and marketing!
customer_reviews.text: Live up to all of the hype and marketing. Doing the Bowflex 20 Minutes Lean Body Plan. I am noticing results. I still have two more weeks to do of the six weeks.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I have limited space and limited funds. This accomplished both.I bench a 255 lbs in LawFit (tested). On this machine I begin to struggle at 220. Nothing can replace free weights but when you live an hour from a gym and want to be able to work out whenever this is great. Plus it wont leave marks and your carpet and the quick change can speed up your workouts. Note on putting it together: It says you have to have two people. I did. Me and my two year old girl put it together. Take your time , watch your temper...you can do it alone. Took maybe an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: I ordered my Bowflex from Amazon on father's day. ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my Bowflex from Amazon on father's day. They advertised it considerably cheaper than I actually had to pay,but I received it the following Thursday. It took about two hours to put together. I am 51 years old, so it is a little harder for me to lose weight than the younger guys and it takes me a little longer to get my workout in. I have had my Bowflex for about thirty days now and have lost just over 10 lbs.as well as toned a lot of muscles working out about 40 minutes a day on average for five days a week..
customer_reviews.author: Al S.

customer_reviews.title: Really Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This machine takes the excuses out of finding time to workout. I am not going to lie...Putting it together is a challenge and you may use a few curse words, but worth it. I have been using it now for three weeks and the results are amazing. I have been trying to lose weight for a long time and this machine makes it fast, fun, and easy. After only using 40 pounds, I don't think I would ever need more than the 210 model. If I do I will buy another machine.
customer_reviews.author: dsandz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a beginner's home gym.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this version of the bowflex is pretty nice but I really wish you could upgrade it! I wouldn't recommend this if you normally go to the gym (maybe 2-3 times a week) and are looking to get something for your home... the rod resistance just doesn't compare and you'll wish (like I do) that you could add more. Also, the rods seem to be wearing faster than I anticipated. All in all, I would definitely recommend this for someone who's just starting out, but not someone who wants to supplement their off-gym days.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Just what the Doctor Ordered.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a toy! It is well engineered and constructed and performs as advertised. The shipping box is large and heavy (150 Lb.) Have and extra person available to get this in the home or $20 to encourage the delivery person ;-). It is very well packaged and take almost an hour to get all the parts out of the box and all of the wrapping off. Assembly is simple using a 1/2" and 9/16" wrenches and a phillips screwdriver. Instructions are easy to follow. I assembled it myself in about 90 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dinsmore

customer_reviews.title: A bit of meh, a bit of yay.
customer_reviews.text: Good for what u pay. I wish I bought the more expensive model though. This is a really anemic system in terms of gear. Have to always change hooks etc. But hey... It's cheap. Great starter set or for those that want to get a system on a budget. I like that the bench can lie flat... Great for using this with free weights also.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Great for my home gym
customer_reviews.text: Great for my home gym. Took some time to put together but wasn't too hard to do. The instructions are pretty straight forward. Doesn't take up too much space and has a wide variety of exercises it can be used for. I do wish I could use it for more ab and leg exercises, but it does cover all of the basics.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas and we both really enjoy using it. I was debating between this and the 3000. I am glad I picked this one. It has a great movable bench seat and 30 exercises. We've been using it everyday and it's great. I don't mind having to change the equipment around either it only takes a couple seconds. I love the fold up feature for extra storage too. My husband loves going to the gym but after having a baby it can be difficult finding time. He says he likes this just as much or more than the gym and he's already seeing great results. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna O

customer_reviews.title: Cancelled the gym membership
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Enough exercises for each body part. Just enough resistance for my purpose. Easy to assemble. Folding bench means I can move it to where I want to put it. Would recommend for anyone looking to get into shape or just stay active.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D Taylor

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: came on time great packaging easy to set up came with everything needed does not fold up very small i myself am not able to push and pull it around or move it around it is heavy but you are able to move it.
customer_reviews.author: D Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Very good especially for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: It's massive but great all in one gym. Excellent for upper body more so than lower. I use weight bars etc to supplement. I work out regularly and find myself needing heavier tension already. Make sure to tie up the rods after every use.
customer_reviews.author: adianice correa

customer_reviews.title: It's an exercise machine, alright.
customer_reviews.text: You can do lots with it and it's not terribly hard to configure each one. It does get kind of tedious switching the hooks, but no more than switching on different machines. This is the 210 lb version, so don't expect to look like any of the guys in the ads without getting one of those extensions with two 50 lb bars or more. My only criticism is that it doesn't secure when folded up for storage. I have to use something to tie it together.
customer_reviews.author: cyko79

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Bowflex Gym hoping to get in shape but have never owned a Bowflex anything. It is very high quality and an excellent price. Not hard to put together at all - it took me about an hour. There are a lot of pieces but the instructions were easy to follow. I would recommend putting it together in the room you want it in because it is a bit heavy once it is assembled. I have been working out on it every other day now for four weeks. I definitely recommend this equipment and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Petry

customer_reviews.title: SO happy!!
customer_reviews.text: First, I am 5'2 female. I had no trouble putting my bowflex together. It took me about 90 minutes, the instructions are excellent. I use the exercises suggested in the instruction booklet that came with the machine as well as, ones for women, I found on the internet. I had 2 disappointments: one- I did not realize how tall in ends up being so I had to change the location to a room with a taller ceiling. Second, when it was delivered they left it out in the driveway. I made it home just in time to get it in the house before it started pouring out. NOT happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Powell

customer_reviews.title: Me and my wife have begun using the PR1000 and we both love it.  We are in our 70's and use it in our home three times a week
customer_reviews.text: The Bowflex PR 1000 got the attention, interest and participation of my wife and compliments my other exercises of crunches, push ups, pull ups, and flutter kicks three times each week and walking nine holes of golf five days each week. We are in our 70's and need to exercise to stay slim, trim and fit. We found the PR1000 simple to use and provides a method where we can encourage each other and work out together.
customer_reviews.author: Goat Roper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beginner's home gym!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 weeks following one of the workout programs that come in the Owner's manual I can already visually confirm results, this is working pretty well for gaining mass and definition. Pros: Easy to assemble, easy to store and very sturdy. Cons: None so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rehnzor

customer_reviews.title: Incredible deal!
customer_reviews.text: This was an incredible investment for the money. It was pretty easy to set up by myself one night and it has stood the test of time so far (I've had for about 11 months now). It is sturdy and has a lot of available exercises. My only complaint is that I wished I had spent the extra money for the next model up because the 210 lbs of resistance isn't enough for my bench and leg presses but that isn't a knock on this product at all. I would recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Richard from Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but needs more weight resistance
customer_reviews.text: I understand that this is a lower-end model, but there is not a enough weight available for an adult man to workout legs for leg presses, etc.
customer_reviews.author: ynpmoose

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this PR1000 to replace an older Bowflex. Pr1000 ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this PR1000 to replace an older Bowflex. Pr1000 stated to do leg exercises, but the leg attachment is only used for one exercise. No leg curl? Sorry I purchased this equipment. Probably ok for upper body, which I will use, but I want to work my legs too. A step backward for Bowflex.
customer_reviews.author: TimS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've been lifting weights on various machines and with free weights for over twenty years, and this machine is awesome, it's quiet, I mean whisper quiet, no slamming of weights, no creaking or squeaking, it's just plain quiet, and it really works out your body in a way that I'm unaccustomed to, having two handles separate is different for me, and the way you add weights is so easy and there is no way to get hurt by getting pinned under weight, what a great product, great for someone who isn't looking to be He-Man, just keep fit.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is a very basic home gym that allows the user access to just about every piece of equipment (weight lifting) at a gym. It is extremly simple to set-up, takes up minimum space and is very convienent to use. The guide that is provided with the Bowflex allows you to pick out any suggested exercise program that fits your needs and includes detailed instructions on how to complete each exercise. I would highly recommend this to anyone who is just starting out as a fitness program and equipment to use. Also, you can purchase a 100 pound upgrade (easy to install) for about $100.00 for this unit.
customer_reviews.author: mjurich

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Excellent for a first-time home gym user.
customer_reviews.text: This is a more basic model that does everything I need it to do. Assembly was no problem, all hardware was included and well marked, and I've been using it daily for a few weeks with no issues. In the future I might consider a more advanced model, but this one is a good deal. Another advantage is that the unit, while heavy, can be moved around without taking it apart. This is handy for housecleaning purposes.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Halsan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and easy to assemble when you have all ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, learned the hard way that there is no warranty from Bowflex when bought from the warehouse deals. Some parts were missing and not covered. Bowflex was kind enough to ship parts for a fee. After emailing customer service, I was given credit for the amount spent on a gift card. This is a great product and easy to assemble when you have all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this Bowflex
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this Bowflex. I've had an older model but this one is way better. The cable placements are perfect for my frame. Woman, 5'5"
customer_reviews.author: KLtx

customer_reviews.title: Love my bowflex
customer_reviews.text: Bowflex is the top brand in home gyms. I love this piece of equipment. It's sleek and easy to use. And it looks great in my gym. The bottom section also folds up for storage, which took us a few months to realize because we skipped over that section in the instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Valero

customer_reviews.title: Low end machine with some good features
customer_reviews.text: It has some nice features but even with the leg part raised up it still takes up a good 6x6' area of whatever room you put it in. The pictures for some reason never showed that the bottom cable is going to be laying on the ground looking terrible unless you are actually using it/have it hooked up.
customer_reviews.author: Shadeofdeath

customer_reviews.title: Nice Equipment
customer_reviews.text: After quite a bit of shopping around, I purchased the basic Amazon BowFlex. The equipment arrived as promised, the carton was sturdy and well packaged. It weighs 150 pounds just so you are not suprised. ( Amazon free shipping saved me at least $100 ). The assembly instructions were fine,all you need is a wrench or socket for assembly. It took me less than an hour to assemble. I really like the machine, it is smooth and quiet. The exercise instructions are a little lacking. An extra pair of hand grips would be a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G. Hanss

customer_reviews.title: We love it! When we received it and opened up ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a old Bowflex that we purchased maybe 20 years ago and it finally started to wear down. (both my husband and I used it every day). So we decided to purchase a new one. We love it! When we received it and opened up we were a little intimidated (are we going to be able to put it together?)My husband and I are seniors). No sweat, we got it up and running. We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great workout equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great workout equipment. Was easy to assemble and use. The only negative things I have to say is, the time it takes to change from one workout exercise to another. But that could be me just being lazy too.
customer_reviews.author: Tanlong05

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Feels well made. Easy to setup. Having to switch the connections when changing from upper body workouts to leg lifts is a bit of a chore, but you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to work out from home and saw this product at a local sporting good store for the same price. Bought it from amazon for the free shipping. Received it rather quickly. It was very easy to assemble (took about an hour an a half). I have been using this machine for about a month. Very easy to switch between exercises and gives me enough resistance for toning and building additional muscle. Great machine for someone who wants to get into shape. Max out at 210lbs, but that is more than sufficient for my intended purposes. If you are looking for a durable and well built machine that will give you a good workout, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L. Millican

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Showed up earlier than expected. Easy to assemble, only required a screwdriver and 2 wrenches. (Be careful I managed to cut myself fairly well due to a sharp edge on one of the nuts.) The only reason I didn't give it a five is because there were minor paint chips / scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: I really love it. I do the exercises shown on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love it. I do the exercises shown on the display but also get creative and come up with other exercises. I recently ordered a blowflex exercise book. I have a gym membership but this is perfect for those days affected by the weather or when I really don't want to workout. I tell myself I'd do just a few and wind up doing a full workout because it is fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: home exercise
customer_reviews.text: Put it together in evening and next morning. Followed clear instructions, but you do have to read then and follow closely to avoid doing things twice. Wife followed exercise manual and has routine daily. We can watch TV or computer test on TV screen during exercise. Great price had a huge savings on Amazon. Promptly shipped, even faster than much smaller items. One box, oh, help the UPS guy when truck pulls up where to place so you can get it inside.
customer_reviews.author: James R Ross

customer_reviews.title: More than pleased
customer_reviews.text: More than pleased with this purchase and have been using it on a regular basis. I wanted this to exercise during the winter months when it was difficult to exercise my usual way. Easy to assemble and use. Build quality is exceptional with good penetrating welds and excellent fabrication. Buy some Bowflex specific exercise books along with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: This Bowflex is awesome! There is nothing negative to say about this machinge at all! If you have any type of background in fitness, you can use this Bowflex for many more exercises than 30 as the manual says. I was a personal trainer for years and I would fully endorse this piece of equipment. This machine, coupled with my Bowflex 1090's, add up to one amazing workout. Putting it together was MUCH easier than expected. From box to finish it took me about 90 minutes. If you are looking for a rock solid piece of equipment at a very good price, look no further. Do not hesitate to buy this Bowflex, you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: Its OK!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Bowflex PR1000. Box came a little dinged up but everything in it was intact and well packed and on time, no issues there. The only issue I have is the redundancy of having to switch out the cables for different exercises. I read in a previous review and thought to myself "how lazy of them" but it is a hassle...lol. The 50 pound rods feel less than well..50 pounds. Do not buy if your looking to get serious. It has a little notch where the rods would go if you wanted to upgrade which prevents one from doing it. Over all its ok I expected more. all the reviews are on point!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: We put it on our porch because it's pretty big and won't collapse, but it's useful. Tons of exercises, and I particularly like having the ability to roll forward and back on your seat. Rowing machines are expensive, but they're such a great workout. Anyway, my one complaint is the low starting weight. You max out at 205 pounds for any workout. That's not really enough to do significant leg work. They sell upgrades, but you'll have to invest in the next pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great starter home gym
customer_reviews.text: I love this gym. It's fun and easy to use, it's intuitive and also lets you be a little creative with range of motion and grip styles. I wish you could do leg curls with it but it's certainly worth the price tag. It was really easy to assemble by myself. I really have no complaints at all asides wishing I could add more weight to it but I'm not close to having to do that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son's 14th b-day. I think I'm using it more than him. It really is very good for what it is. It is well made, works well, and provides a decent workout. I used to lift weights 20-25 years ago, and I would agree that this will probably not work for a serious weight lifter (not enough resitance available). But for a 14 yr old, typical female, over the hill male (myself), or anyone requiring light to moderate resistance, this is great machine...especially for $399!
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: It's a simple machine if you don't like to work out of the gym or make most ...
customer_reviews.text: It was simple enough for my boyfriend to set up everything within 2 hours. It's a simple machine if you don't like to work out of the gym or make most of your time at home. It won't make you buff, but it'll keep you in shape if you use the machine to exercise regularly.
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Bowflex
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice Bowflex. Great quality. Nice bench and seat. Very solid. Smooth rolling seat for leg presses. Far superior than my original Power Pro. Will upgrade easily to 310lbs - you only need to cut a small "lip" near the power rods to insert two 50lb rods. I assembled the unit in just over an hour - taking my time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that was easily assembled, it took a while but it was not difficult. As far as using the product, easy and beneficial. Might be my best purchase of 2017.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

customer_reviews.title: Great home gym.  Best price I found online.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 15-year old son. He loves it. Love the fact that there are no clanky weights. You have resistance both ways when "lifting" with the Bowflex. I thought it would be a nightmare to assemble but it was surprisingly easy. It took me and my son two hours to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: K Warren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Takes up a lot of space & time consuming to put together. Solid construction and really well designed. Cancelled my gym membership after decades of going.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Good product for home fitness
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, I saw some bad reviews about the weight limits, and honestly I like it and don't see any issue with the resistance capacity, if I was trying to train for an iron man competition I wouldn't be doing it at home. For it's purpose this is a great machine, and easy to assemble and switch between exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Solid workout system
customer_reviews.text: Solid system that works if you work with it. I'm a rookie to fitness thing but following the system that they provide in the booklet has already showed me results. It's a solid piece and it works just like it should. I'm very satisfied with what I got for what I paid. Might consider the upgrade version of it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok, however the seating bench tore down in 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Gong Chang

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of equipment for the money
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were looking for a piece of equipment to help tone and shape. We weren't looking for fitness model status just a healthier lifestyle. Overall im satisfied with the machine. Assembly was straight foward but i am very mechanically inclined. Set up is very simple and my wife can change resistance and positions effortlessly
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to build, and is a good value. My only real complaint is that it's very upper-body heavy. There aren't a ton of good lower-body exercises and many of the ones it supports end up being awkward.
customer_reviews.author: C. A.

customer_reviews.title: The price was right and the product is as good as it has been since I bought my first ...
customer_reviews.text: The price was right and the product is as good as it has been since I bought my first one years ago. Easier on my joints and tendons than weights and I can work out longer with less fatigue. Excited to see how I look in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Richbone69

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Love my Bowflex. Well constructed. Easy to assemble. One of the best purchases I have every made.
customer_reviews.author: G Dog

customer_reviews.title: small apartment gym
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad machine for a small apartment. It does the job, some work to reconfigure, but very durable and comfortable. No real complaints. Materials are good and building it wasn't bad for me on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great System
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for about a month now. Really love it. Very easy to setup and use. Provides nice even resistance while you are working out. I am looking for a general workout so no issues with the resistance except leg press. The leg lift is nice at the end of the bench but I don't find the leg press very useful given the 210lbs of resistance - not really enough for me. The Bowflex machine is much higher quality than what I see at sporting goods stores for the same price. Recommend for those that want to just stay in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Got to get that

customer_reviews.title: He plays football and basketball and this is perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son, as well as the two year warranty, for Christmas. He plays football and basketball and this is perfect for him. My wife and I use it as well. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy winchell

customer_reviews.title: its not very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: its not very easy to use. each time you change your position you have to re route all the lines to work the different areas. So doing a circuit is a pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is great for strengthening
customer_reviews.text: Had it over 3 months. In conjunction with walking I went from 15 minute workouts (extremely obese all I could do) to 3 months later doing 2 hours sessions. I have lost 75lbs so far. It is great for strengthening. I am very happy I got this product I am almost gym ready!!!
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great cost for a workout machine.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and it was easy to install. It comes down to some basic workouts and limited on the weight but for my age and what I want to do it's perfect. But when I was lifting heavy back in the days the machine may be to basic. Not necessary the weight portion since it's resistant workouts but the features that it offers. The rowing portion is pretty much not working for me since I am under 6 feet but works great for the wife since she is 6 feet. I think the stride and the length of the cords are an issue. But overall love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Wow, why didn't I get one of these a ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, why didn't I get one of these a long time ago. I am 75 years old and I exercise 6 days a week using the Body Building set of exercises.
customer_reviews.author: phlip

customer_reviews.title: Small enough and strong enough for the right price.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. The quality don't disappoint. We don't have much space in room where is now and don't look in the way at all. The bench bar fold and lock in place, so the machine is out of the way when not in use. IF anyone is interested in a machine that will keep you in shape, and get some muscle tone and build up strength AT HOME.... this is perfect ! for the price there is no contest !
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: All in one gym
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact size and option to be able to fold up this gym. However, for the space I put it in and use it I didn't take into account the weight bands stretching / flexing. I was able to overcome that conflict. I checked out the space needed on the Bowflex and Amazon websites but that information only shows the gym at rest or in storage mode. The manual that comes with the gym tells you the working space needed which is 103" L and 80" W. I was a little skeptical that plastic bands could get you a workout but they do. I would suggest purchasing this gym if you want an all-in-one piece.
customer_reviews.author: J. Aden

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Construction, while tedious, was not very difficult. Exercise manual is a little less than impressive, but still fairly clear about how to go about the different exercises. My rooommate and I absolutely love the machine. We've been using it for a few weeks now and are already seeing some results. I've done free-weight exercises before, but all I ever got from that was sore muscles. To be fair, I'm not ripped yet ;), but I can already see some definition in my arms. Based on the weights we are using now, the 210lb max leaves plenty of room for growth and shouldn't be a problem unless you're trying to be a bodybuilder.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been asking for a home gym for a while, so I just bought it for her birthday. Like others it took me about two hours to put it together. I have seen complaints about having to change the pulley configs for the different workouts, but I don't feel this is any different then changing weights. This unit is fun, and makes working out pretty easy. The manual is excellent, you get one manual for assembly and another for the workouts. I do see us buying a rod pack upgrade in the future, but 210 is fine for getting use the workouts and the machine.
customer_reviews.author: David E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Went together easily. I think this will definitely be a good start for me and will definitely get me to where I wanna be. The instructions were easy. It also doesn't take up too much space either. Very easy to use as well. I think I made a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: The_Abenator

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the cost :) bought some additional 50lb weights for it and my husband uses everyday as do i!
customer_reviews.author: deli91

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and good sturdy quality. I am already feeling the results after just 3 sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Blast

customer_reviews.title: Nice home gym
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Was a little worried about the quality of workout, but after using it for a couple of months, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy in CV

customer_reviews.title: Good for quick strengthening system for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good for quick strengthening system for the money. Only problem I have is there is not enough weights. It says 205 pounds it's more like 165 pounds. Buy the additional weight block for more weight
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money.....
customer_reviews.text: Took a little over an hour to assemble, and all the parts were there. My wife and I use it everyday. I am very happy with the variety of exercises that can be done, and you can get many more if your a little creative. One note though, there is a small plastic sticky-backed cable holder that goes on the back of the vertical assembly that is designed to hold the top cables out of the way. It came lose after just a week. I used some Gorilla glue on it and still holding after three weeks. If your on a budget (who isn't) and don't like gyms, this is the way to go!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great set up now need to use it more was ...
customer_reviews.text: great set up now need to use it more was not difficult to assemble parts seem to be heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: BKinVa

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!!
customer_reviews.text: This will actually kick your butt!! You better be ready for a good workout as this machine will make you lean in no time!! Packaged perfectly when it arrived. Even with the shipping charges, it was still cheaper to buy it on Amazon. Very sturdy machine!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Warning--it comes in a ton of pieces/boxes so ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Warning--it comes in a ton of pieces/boxes so you need to assemble. Assembly took a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Hope P

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that I'm extremely pleased with
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that I'm extremely pleased with. It took me about 3 hours to put together and I had to take up my stairs a piece or so at a time. It is very easy to change out the various positions. Excellent buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble, very well built and works great!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I assembled this gym in about an hour and a half with no problems. The instructions are very clear and precise with all parts properly labeled. It seems like its a very sturdy gym that will lasts a long time. It is very quiet and smooth when using it. I am very satisfied with this purchase and product quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Have been using it since purchase a week ago. My wife and I use it every other day. Love the quality build and shipping was great. As always when you purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: bart119

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Good resistance. Good size when folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good versatile piece of workout equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are too skimpy but I have found all sorts of exercises to work out even the small muscle groups. I m an old and decrepit kind of guy, not a body builder. I would like more locking positions for the seat. Took 4 hours to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Joe Seda

product_meta.title: Bowflex PR1000 Home Gym
product_meta.description: The Bowflex PR1000 home gym is a great way to strengthen your muscles and add a bit of cardio training to the mix with over 30 strength exercises and a built-in rowing station. With up to 210 pounds of Power Rod resistance, this versatile machine helps work the abs, arms, chest, back, shoulders, and lower body. It includes triple-function hand grips for lat pull-down, a horizontal bench press, and four-inch upholstered roller cushions for leg extension and leg curl exercises. The rowing machine rail also folds when you're done with your workout
feature_bullets: Get a total body strength workout with affordable home gym, includes rowing machine rail
Provides as little as five or as many as 210 Pounds of resistance
Includes horizontal bench press and lat pull down
300 Pound maximum user weight, requires 100 x 78 Inch minimum workout area
Shipping box : 54” x 33” x 8” ; Assembled unit : 84” x 38” x 82”

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
